column4: BLD_FILL_COLOR_CTL Offset 0x000 BLD fill color control register
BLD_CH_RTCTL BLD routing control register (default value 0x00543210)
Write-back Group A channel 0 address register
Write-back Group A channel 1 address register
Write-back Group A channel 2 address register
Write-back Group A address high bit register

Write-back Group B channel 1 address register
Write-back Group B channel 2 address register
Write-back Group B address high bit register
0x200 + N*4 Channel 0 horizontal coefficient register N ( N = 0,1,2,...,15)
0x280 + N*4 Channel 1/2 horizontal coefficient register N ( N = 0,1,2,...,15)
ix=0: Y, ix=1: U/UV channel, ix=3: V channel
OVL_Y, OVL_UV overlay window size register
OVL_V horizontal down sample control register
OVL_V vertical down sample control register
